Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Masters of Evil , Scientist
Real Name: Simon Williams
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: BEAST: If Wonder Man and the listed friendly character are on the map, they both modify attack and damage +1.
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) IONIC RESURRECTION: When Wonder Man would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with Avengers Forever #027 Wonder Man on click #9, then roll a d6 and heal him equal to half the result. Protected: Pulse Wave.

November 10, 2022
extremis
they really should take it easy on the power creep...
October 24, 2022
Oathful
Honestly didn't think we'd get a Wonder Man with this set, but I'll take it. He's got good keywords, nice stats and a nice trait that could lead to you having at least 8 clicks if not way more depending on your roll for the trait and the fact that you end up landing on regeneration on the #027 version of him 2/3 of the time. I'm just glad they didn't make him a pacifist dial (in the comics he becomes a pacifist for a bit), that would have been sad. EDIT* Coming back after the Team-Up cards were revealed, and I LOVE the fact that his is with Beast, his best friend in the comics. On top of that, we have a good selection of Beasts to pair Wonder Man with, bringing some good support powers and a secondary attacker for Wonder Man. // Thematic: 10/10, Viability: 9/10, Fun Factor: 9.5/10, fairly balanced fun.
